name: Sam Mangwana
description: '''Sam Mangwana''' (born 21 February 1945) is a [[Democratic Republic of the Congo|Congolese]] musician and songwriter. He was the frontman of his bands Festival des Maquisards and African All Stars. Mangwana was a member of [[François Luambo Makiadi|François Luambo Makiadi's]] seminal band [[TPOK Jazz]], and [[Tabu Ley Rochereau|Tabu Ley Rochereau's]] bands [[African Fiesta]], African Fiesta National and [[Afrisa International]].
